entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
